this is a port of libquantum-1.0.0 from c to java.

the code was downloaded from 
   
the copyrights are in the individual files,
   Copyright 2003 Bjoern Butscher, Hendrik Weimer
their license is
     GNU General Public License version 3

Note that for now, the memoization class for method
   invocation called objcode, has been removed.
